document.heading: Campaign Finance Reform and Transparency Amendment Act of 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-79, the “Campaign Finance Reform and Transparency Amendment Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-76. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 5, 2013, and December 3, 2013, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 27, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 20-249 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-79 became effective on February 22, 2014.
